pl.marczynski.seriesapp.repository

Interface WatchedEpisodeRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<WatchedEpisode,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<WatchedEpisode,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<WatchedEpisode,java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<WatchedEpisode>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<WatchedEpisode,java.lang.Long>

    @Repository
public interface WatchedEpisodeRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<WatchedEpisode,java.lang.Long>
    Spring Data repository for the WatchedEpisode entity.

      • findByEpisodeIdAndUserIsCurrentUser

        @Query(value="select watched_episode from WatchedEpisode watched_episode where watched_episode.user.login = ?#{principal.username} and watched_episode.episode.id = :episodeId")

      • getAverageRateByEpisodeId

        @Query(value="select avg(case watched_episode.rate when \'BAD\' then 1 when \'MEDIOCRE\' then 2 when \'AVERAGE\' then 3 when \'GOOD\' then 4 when \'AWESOME\' then 5 else 0 END) from WatchedEpisode as watched_episode where watched_episode.episode.id = :episodeId and watched_episode.rate is not null")
java.lang.Float getAverageRateByEpisodeId(@Param(value="episodeId")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        java.lang.Long episodeId)

        Parameters:
        episodeId - the id of the episode to check
        Returns:
        Float

      • getRateCountByEpisodeId

        @Query(value="select count(watched_episode) from WatchedEpisode as watched_episode where watched_episode.episode.id = :episodeId and watched_episode.rate is not null")
